channel.title: New Publication on Richelle Jade Tuquero
channel.description: Recent content in New Publication on Richelle Jade Tuquero

item.title: Limit torus in a quantum gas setup
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Using bifurcation theory, we demonstrate that a limit cycle instability in a quantum system can lead to the emergence of a limit torus.

item.title: Smooth transition to dynamical phases due to quantum noise
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We showed how quantum noise affects the general transition or cross-over from stationary to dyanmical phase such as LCs.

item.title: Stable and Metastable Dissipative Time Crystal
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We showed that stable dissipative time crystals can exist beyond the ideal limit and introduced a new phase, the prethermal dissipative time crystal in an atom-cavity system.
